variants.name: build_system

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-click
dependent_to.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependent_to.name: py-rich
dependent_to.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependent_to.name: py-isort
dependent_to.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependent_to.name: py-typesentry
dependent_to.description: Python library for run-time type checking for type-annotated functions.

dependent_to.name: py-bandit
dependent_to.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.

dependent_to.name: py-pylint
dependent_to.description: python code static checker

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: py-terminaltables
dependent_to.description: Generate simple tables in terminals from a nested list of strings.

dependent_to.name: gatetools
dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate

dependent_to.name: py-knack
dependent_to.description: A Command-Line Interface framework.

dependent_to.name: py-loguru
dependent_to.description: Loguru is a library which aims to bring enjoyable logging in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-tqdm
dependent_to.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools Core Module.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-conan
dependent_to.description: Conan C/C++ package manager

dependent_to.name: py-ipython
dependent_to.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.

dependent_to.name: py-py2neo
dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-cpp
dependent_to.description: Use pytest runner to discover and execute C++ tests.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-meson-python
dependent_to.description: Meson Python build backend (PEP 517).

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation
dependent_to.description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: awscli
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services

dependent_to.name: py-build
dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.

dependent_to.name: py-rbtools
dependent_to.description:
RBTools is a set of command line tools and a rich Python API for use
with Review Board.

dependent_to.name: py-nbdime
dependent_to.description: Diff and merge of Jupyter Notebooks

dependent_to.name: py-radical-utils
dependent_to.description:
RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
